summary.para: The TS_SELECTIONSTYLE structure represents the style of a selection.

remarks.para: An interim character selection is the length of one character and is visually represented as a solid rectangle that is usually flashing. This is a standard UI element of Korean and some Chinese character compositions. fInterimChar is an indication that a specific character is being composed. fInterimChar can only be nonzero for a single selection. In this case, there will be no caret because the highlight takes its place.

summary.para: Specifies the active end of the selection. For more information, see .

Indicates if the selection is an interim character. If this value is nonzero, then the selection is an interim character and ase will be TS_AE_NONE. If this value is zero, the selection is not an interim character.
